SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package components

Interface Calculator

public interface Calculator
Interface of system component that performs price and VAT tax calculations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    calculateIncludedVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate)
    Calculate a tax included in a gross ("brutto") value based on a given tax rate.
    long
    calculateOrderItemValue(Order.OrderItem item, Pricing pricing)
    Calculate the value of an Order.OrderItem as: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
    long
    calculateOrderItemVAT(Order.OrderItem item, Pricing pricing)
    Calculate the VAT included in an order item price uding method: calculateVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate).
    long
    calculateOrderValue(Order order)
    Calculate the total value of an order from the value of each ordered item, calculated with: calculateOrderItemValue(item).
    long
    calculateOrderVAT(Order order)
    Calculate the total VAT of an order from compounded VAT of order items calculated with: calculateOrderItemVAT(item).

  • Method Details

    • calculateIncludedVAT

      long calculateIncludedVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate)
      Calculate a tax included in a gross ("brutto") value based on a given tax rate. Applies to VAT taxes called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany.
      Parameters:
      grossValue - value that includes the tax
      taxRate - applicable tax rate
      Returns:
      tax included in gross value or 0L if gross value <= 0L

    • calculateOrderItemValue

      long calculateOrderItemValue(Order.OrderItem item, Pricing pricing)
      Calculate the value of an Order.OrderItem as: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate value for
      pricing - Pricing to find article unitPrice
      Returns:
      value of ordered item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null arguments

    • calculateOrderItemVAT

      long calculateOrderItemVAT(Order.OrderItem item, Pricing pricing)
      Calculate the VAT included in an order item price uding method: calculateVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate).
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate VAT for
      pricing - Pricing to find VAT tax rate applicable to article
      Returns:
      VAT for ordered item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null arguments

    • calculateOrderValue

      long calculateOrderValue(Order order)
      Calculate the total value of an order from the value of each ordered item, calculated with: calculateOrderItemValue(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate value for
      Returns:
      total value of order
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null argument

    • calculateOrderVAT

      long calculateOrderVAT(Order order)
      Calculate the total VAT of an order from compounded VAT of order items calculated with: calculateOrderItemVAT(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate VAT tax for
      Returns:
      VAT calculated for order
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null argument
